name: twitter_downloader_brick
description: The downloader for downloading data from Twitter accounts

parameters.name: bds_bucket
parameters.description: The BDS Bucket name. The structure on BDS looks like this: bds_bucket/bds_folder/account_id/token

parameters.name: bds_folder
parameters.description: The BDS Bucket name. The structure on BDS looks like this: bds_bucket/bds_folder/account_id/token

parameters.name: bds_access_key
parameters.description: The BDS access key to connect to BDS.

parameters.name: bds_secret_key
parameters.description: The BDS secret key to connect to BDS.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The account id name. The structure on BDS looks like this: bds_bucket/bds_folder/account_id/token

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token name. The structure on BDS looks like this: bds_bucket/bds_folder/account_id/token

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: This is an ID of downloader specified in configuration file

parameters.name: consumer_key
parameters.description: Consumer key of an account you are going to use to download data of accounts specidied

parameters.name: consumer_secret
parameters.description: Consumer secret of an account you are going to use to download data of accounts specidied

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Access token of an account you are going to use to download data of accounts specidied

parameters.name: access_token_secret
parameters.description: Access token secret  of an account you are going to use to download data of accounts specidied
